name: xp-schema
description: This class is used to provide scheming functionalities, including sanitization and validation.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://expandjs.com)

scripts.build: browserify index -i expandjs --standalone XPSchema > dist/xp-schema.js && npm run build:min
scripts.build:min: browserify -d index -i expandjs --standalone XPSchema -p [minifyify --map xp-schema.min.map --output dist/xp-schema.min.map] > dist/xp-schema.min.js
